text:
Mandy Moore is more than ready to say her "I do's."

The actress got engaged to boyfriend and Dawes musician Taylor Goldsmith nearly eight months ago, and fans cannot contain their excitement about the upcoming nuptials for the star of This Is Us . But fear not, Rebecca Pearson fans: the wedding might just happen anytime now.

"I think we have a general ballpark idea of when we want it to happen, but I think because it's not going to be some lavish affair, it's maybe something that isn't going to require as much planning, or at least that's what I'm telling myself," she told Sibley Scoles in an interview on E! News . "I picked a funny profession for someone who doesn't like all the attention focused on them, so I've already done my girls weekend."

The 34-year-old also dished about the engagement party she had last September. "It was sort of a birthday/bachelorette girls weekend all rolled into one and that was fabulous and fantastic so now I sort of feel like it could happen at a moment's notice. Maybe I won't even tell people and they'll just show up at the house and it will just unfold."

See more: Mandy Moore Says She Didn't Want an Engagement Ring Until She Saw the One Fiancé Taylor Goldsmith Picked Out

The star has been hinting at wedding plans since news of her engagement broke, giving fans a little taste of whats to come for the big day. The star of A Walk To Remember said that she wants to keep her wedding pretty low key—the actress previously told Us Weekly , "This is my second go-round," Moore explained, referring to her first marriage to singer Ryan Adams, from whom she finalized her divorce in 2016. "I feel like I eloped before and I think I'll probably keep it very small again. I've never been the girl that wanted to wear a white dress. No judgement, but it's not for me. I think it'll be just as small with family and friends. Quit, no bridal magazines for me." (Hopefully she changes her mind for us!)

The bride has not yet confirmed a wedding date, but it sounds like she's just going with the flow. Kudos, Mandy.
title: Mandy Moore Says Her Wedding Could Happen "at a Moment's Notice"
